participant_1.name: Jessica Pearson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and confident, Jessica enjoys socializing and expressing herself through fashion. She has a passion for music and gaming, balancing her professional life as a lawyer with her creative interests.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Liam Harrison
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, Liam has a love for the arts and dreams of a bustling city life. He deeply values his rural upbringing and the connection to nature it provided him.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.
